snippet: Unesco on Tuesday awarded a prize for research in the life sciences made controversial because it was financed by the dictator of Equatorial Guinea, a tiny, repressive and impoverished state.
lead_paragraph: Unesco on Tuesday awarded a prize for research in the life sciences made controversial because it was financed by the dictator of Equatorial Guinea, a tiny, repressive and impoverished state.

headline.seo: France: Unesco Awards Prize Financed by Dictator
